title: Google TV integrates with over 30 streaming services and apps, here’s the full list [U]
content:
Perhaps the most useful thing about the new Google TV platform is the ability to aggregate and organize content from a variety of different sources. Which ones, though? Here’s a full list of streaming services and apps that Google TV supports.

more…

The post Google TV integrates with over 30 streaming services and apps, here’s the full list [U] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Here's a full breakdown of all the streaming services and apps supported by Google TV at launch, as well as a peek into what's next.
